answerText: Henderson-Hasselbalch equation[10] The pKa term in the Henderson-Hasselbach equation refers to the negative log of this constant.
heading: ACF Regionals |2013 | Bellarmine + Chicago A | 3 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Identify this equation that gives pH as equal to pKa plus the log of the quantity A- over HA.
